description: Numbers n such that 54^n - 53^n is prime.
comments: Terms greater than 1000 often correspond only to strong probable primes.a(6) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Feb 18 2013
author: _Mike Oakes_, May 18 2001, May 19 2001
extensions: a(5) = 11003 found by Mike Oakes in Aug 2003. - _Jean-Louis Charton_, Aug 15 2012
